itemDisplayName: Deploy a SQL Server 2014 Failover Cluster with SIOS DataKeeper
description: This template creates four new Windows Server 2012 R2 VMs configured as a 2 node SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn Cluster protected by the SIOS DataKeeper replication solution.
summary: This template provides a quick and easy way to test the SIOS DataKeeper replication solution in conjunction with Microsoft's Windows Failover Cluster and SQL 2014 products. It can also be used as a foundation for a permanent solution if desired.
